”thamange paripalanaya yaha palanaya” niyojanaya karana bawata janadhipathi sirisena ha agamathi wika්ramasinha ge awadharanaya kirim walata patahaniwa, bedumwadi demala eelam wimukthi koti sanwidhanaya 2009 di parajaya kota wasara hathak ikma gos thibiyadi, kolambaa polis rajya palana widhika්rama kamkaru panthiyata ha piditha janathawata erehiwa thawamath pawichchi karana bawa wadhahinsawata erehi kamituwa pahadili karayi.

shri lankawata chodana karamin jagath maha lekam ban ki mun wisin eksath jathinge aarakshaka mandalayata idiripath kala warthawa sambandhayen kanagatuwa palakarana bawa rajaya awadharanaya karayi.yuda gatam pawathi kalawala di sthri dushana saha lingika prachanda kriya sidu wu ratawal 21k atharata shri lankawa da athulath karamin ban ki mun wisin me warthawa eksath jathinge aarakshaka mandalata idiripathkara athi athara ee sandaha jagath manawa himikam kawunsalaya wetha idiripath kala yojanawe karunu da salakillata gena thibena bawa wartha weyi.yuropaya, aasiyawa, aprikawa, dakunu amerikawa saha madaperadiga ratawal kihipayaka yuda gatum pawathi kalawala di sidu wu dushana saha lingika prachanda kriya sambandhayen eksath jathinge maha lekam ban ki mun wisin mema ratawal athulath warthawak nikuthkara thibe.shri lankawata amatharawa angolawa, bosniyawa, harsagowina, kampuchiya , kolombiyawa, giniyawa, layibiriyawa, libiyawa, nepalaya, siyaraliyon, somaliyawa, sudanaya, yemanaya yana ratawal da ema layisthuwata athulathkara atha.shri lankawa wisin prathikshepa karana lada jagath manawa himikam kawunsala warthawe karunu da me warthawa sandaha yoda ganima sambandhayen kanagatuwa palakarana shri lanka rajaya me sambandhayen awadhanayata lakkara thibena bawa prakasha karayi.manawa himikam yojanawe anthargathaya shri lankawa wisin prathikshepa kara thibena athara eya rate gatumkari thaththwayak nirmanayakara thibena bawa da gatum hethuwen athiwu thuwala suwapath kirima wenuwen thawaduratath idiri kriyamarga ganna bawa da rajaya prakasha karayi.me sahajiwana kriyamargaya jathyantharakaranayata lakwima thulin shri lankawe siduwana wardhaniya thaththwayan nosalaka harimak siduwana athara meya deshiya washayen kalayuthu kriyamargayak bawa da rajaya penwa deyi.lingika prachandathwaya rajaye aarakshaka ansha wisin sidukarana bawata atham sanwidhana sidukarana waradi pracharayan shri lanka rajaya wisin thawaduratath prathikshepa karayi..
gedi newe lunu goniyakma athi.

ohuta wayasa 55 sapirenne ada ya.

indhana prawahanaya karamin thibu bawusarayak dakshina adhiwegi margaye beliaththa, isurupura palama asala di perali yamen ada (31) dahawal anathurak siduwa thibenawa.mathara pihiti khanija thel sanstha gabadawe sita maththala dakwa indhana prawahanaya karamin thibu bawusarayakuyi melesa anathurata lakwa aththe.bawusaraye idiripasa rodayak pupura yamen riyaduruta rathaya palanaya karaganimata nohakiwa mema anathura siduwa thibenawa.anathuren pasu awata pradeshawasin pamina bawusarayen pitathata galayana indhana raskara ganimata katayuthu kara athi bawayi wartha wanne.pasuwa wenath bawusarayak genwa ithiriwa thibu indhana purawagena ragena yamatayi katayuthu kara aththe.anathurin kisiwekuth thuwala laba nomathi athara adhiwegi margaye yakada watata alabha hani siduwa thibenawa.
ehew apita baha hithumanapeta chodana gonu karanna.
